Package edu.kit.kastel.mcse.ardoco.core.common.util

Class FilePrinter

java.lang.Object
edu.kit.kastel.mcse.ardoco.core.common.util.FilePrinter
public final class FilePrinter extends Object
The Class FilePrinter contains some helpers for stats.

  • Method Details

    • printResultsInFiles

      public static void printResultsInFiles(Path path, String name, ArDoCoResult arDoCoResult)
      Prints details of the results of a run into files within the given directory (path). Writes out detailed info about model instances, noun mappings, trace links, all states, and inconsistencies. Uses the provided (project) name as part of the file names.
      Parameters:
      path - the directory where the files should be written
      name - name of the project
      arDoCoResult - the results that should be written

    • writeSentencesInFile

      public static void writeSentencesInFile(File target, Text text)
      Writes the sentences as they are stored in the PARSE graph into a file.
      Parameters:
      target - the target file
      text - the text to use.

    • writeStatesToFile

      public static void writeStatesToFile(File resultFile, ModelExtractionState extractionState, TextState ntrState, RecommendationState recommendationState, ConnectionState connectionState)
      * Writes the states into a file.
      Parameters:
      resultFile - the result file
      extractionState - the extraction state, containing the extracted elements of the model
      ntrState - the name type relation state, containing the mappings found in the text, sorted in name, type or name_or_type
      recommendationState - the supposing state, containing the supposing mappings for instances, as well as relations
      connectionState - containing all instances and relations, matched by supposed mappings

    • writeDataLinesInFile

      public static void writeDataLinesInFile(File file, org.eclipse.collections.api.list.ImmutableList<String[]> dataLines)
      Write data lines in file.
      Parameters:
      file - the file
      dataLines - the data lines

    • writeToFile

      public static void writeToFile(String filename, String text)
      Writes the given text to the file with the given name/path. Truncates existing files, creates the file if not existent and writes in UTF-8.
      Parameters:
      filename - the name/path of the file
      text - the text to write

    • writeToFile

      public static void writeToFile(Path file, String text)
      Writes the given text to the given file (as path). Truncates existing files, creates the file if not existent and writes in UTF-8.
      Parameters:
      file - the path of the file
      text - the text to write

    • writeInconsistencyOutput

      public static void writeInconsistencyOutput(File file, ArDoCoResult arDoCoResult)
